verses.plain: LORD, how are they increased that trouble me! many are they that rise up against me.

tokens.t: , how are they increased that trouble me! many
they that rise up against me.

verses.plain: Many there be which say of my soul, There is no help for him in God. Selah.

tokens.t: no help for him in God. Selah.

verses.plain: But thou, O LORD, art a shield for me; my glory, and the lifter up of mine head.

tokens.t: a shield for me; my glory, and the lifter up of mine head.

verses.plain: I cried unto the LORD with my voice, and he heard me out of his holy hill. Selah.

tokens.t: with my voice, and he heard me out of his holy hill. Selah.

verses.plain: I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for the LORD sustained me.

tokens.t: I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for the

verses.plain: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people, that have set themselves against me round about.

tokens.t: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people, that have set

verses.plain: Arise, O LORD; save me, O my God: for thou hast smitten all mine enemies upon the cheek bone; thou hast broken the teeth of the ungodly.

tokens.t: ; save me, O my God: for thou hast smitten all mine enemies
the cheek bone; thou hast broken the teeth of the ungodly.

verses.plain: Salvation belongeth unto the LORD: thy blessing is upon thy people. Selah.
